title: 01/22/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 01/22/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
-The playoffs will come down to the QB and that's why the Packers should win the Super Bowl

-Only two of these NFL coaching hires will work out

-The Chiefs have a weakness the Bills can take advantage of

-Colin makes his two picks for the Conference Championship games

-Don't overlook how bad Dan Campbell's press conference was and what it means


Guests: Brandon Staley, Chargers Head Coach

Eric Mangini, former Jets & Browns Head Coach

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
